snippet.title: StellaGale The Trial of Faith Early Access Trailer | G2G Gamer to Gamer 2024
snippet.description:
#steamnextfest #indiegame #hackandslash #actionrpg #cinematictrailer #openinganime #steamgame #2d #handdrawnanimation 
Slash every obstacle the Colosseum has to offer! In this Hand-drawn Hack-n-Slash adventure game, where you play as Stella, a young mechanic who fighting her way up to seek an answer to the mystery of her long-lost father. In her desperation to win the fight, a miracle happened.

Wishlist Us & Join our Early Access Plan! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1538710/StellaGale_The_Trials_Of_Faith/

Join our Discord Server
https://discord.gg/NdBdmw3v2m

Follow our Social Media
Instagram https://www.instagram.com/extralifeent/
Twitter/X https://twitter.com/StellaGale_EL
TikTok https://www.tiktok.com/@extralifeent 
Youtube https://www.youtube.com/@extralifeentertainment
